algorithm_technique: Prefix and suffix product calculation without division.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the product of all elements except the current one for each element in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Computes prefix products in one pass and suffix products in another, then combines them to get the final result.
key_insights: The key insight is to break down the problem into calculating products to the left and products to the right of each element.
By pre-calculating prefix products and then incorporating suffix products in a second pass, division is avoided.
The space complexity can be optimized to O(1) by reusing the output array to store intermediate prefix products.
